name: Plodding Penguin
description:
This Game was designed on the Vive Cosmos but should work well with Oculus Quest or any other VR set with the appropriate controllers. 

Plodding Penguin: Player Instructions
As you will learn from your initial encounter with Gary the pelican, Penguin Island’s all-knowing all-glowing mascot, your primary objective is to save the island’s inhabitants and prevent the rising ocean levels from destroying homes. To do this, you will need to “slide” around the island to collect golden pebbles, Penguin Island’s form of currency, to help restore economic balance between penguins of high- and low-income status.  
The island’s blue ice track is designated for sliding—the best way to acquire gold pebbles.
 When standing on the track, press A with your right hand to begin sliding.
To stop sliding, press the B button.

Gold pebbles can be used to purchase more structurally stable houses for penguins whose homes are small and in danger of being flooded by the rising water levels. Gary the Pelican can upgrade houses at the price of 30 pebbles.
During your journey, you will need to keep track of how many golden stones you have collected and how many houses you have upgraded. To find this information, press the Y button to view your menu screen.

You can interact with the various characters on Penguin Island, they always have something interesting to say. Your progress on the island will not go unnoticed by your fellow penguins!

Beat the game by fixing every house one the Island!
